pr_title: Some javadoc and param names in mostly server related classes.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 3 titleFadeTicks
          
          
            
            		ARG 3 titleFadeInTicks
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -72,6 +72,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_329 net/minecraft/client/gui/hud/InGameHud
 	METHOD method_1761 renderPumpkinOverlay ()V
 	METHOD method_1762 renderHotbarItem (IIFLnet/minecraft/class_1657;Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;)V
 	METHOD method_1763 setTitles (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;III)V
+		ARG 1 title
+		ARG 2 subtitle
+		ARG 3 titleFadeTicks

timeline.author: YanisBft

replies.bodyText: When I tried LOGGER, it said the name of the field would conflict with the logger in RconClient
replies.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: It's a known Enigma bug, the only solution right now is to edit the name in the mapping file directly. Static fields or methods don't conflict with parent/child classes
replies.author: YanisBft

timeline.bodyText: don't need title prefix in the last 3 params
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -72,6 +72,11 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_329 net/minecraft/client/gui/hud/InGameHud
 	METHOD method_1761 renderPumpkinOverlay ()V
 	METHOD method_1762 renderHotbarItem (IIFLnet/minecraft/class_1657;Lnet/minecraft/class_1799;)V
 	METHOD method_1763 setTitles (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;III)V
+		ARG 1 title
+		ARG 2 subtitle
+		ARG 3 titleFadeInTicks
+		ARG 4 titleRemainTicks
+		ARG 5 titleFadeOutTicks

timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,4 +1,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1133 net/minecraft/server/LanServerPinger + COMMENT Used to send UDP multicasts, which notify other clients of a local game on the same network. + COMMENT + COMMENT

These multicasts will always be sent to {@code 224.0.2.60:4445} where other clients can listen for local games.

timeline.bodyText: consider using blockquote pre tags and unordered/ordered lists
timeline.author: liach
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,8 +12,24 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1133 net/minecraft/server/LanServerPinger ARG 1 motd ARG 2 addressPort METHOD method_4818 createAnnouncement (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;)Ljava/lang/String; + COMMENT Creates a server announcement. + COMMENT + COMMENT

Server announcements are made of the following: + COMMENT

    + COMMENT
  • [MOTD] // Specifies the beginning of the message of the day

timeline.message: Some javadoc and param names in mostly server related classes.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 3 titleFadeIn
          
          
            
            		ARG 4 titleRemain
          
          
            
            		ARG 5 titleFadeOut
          
          
            
            		ARG 3 fadeInTicks
          
          
            
            		ARG 4 remainTicks
          
          
            
            		ARG 5 fadeOutTicks
          
      
    
    
  

You removed the suffix, not the prefix
timeline.author: YanisBft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -74,9 +74,9 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_329 net/minecraft/client/gui/hud/InGameHud
 	METHOD method_1763 setTitles (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;III)V
 		ARG 1 title
 		ARG 2 subtitle
-		ARG 3 titleFadeInTicks
-		ARG 4 titleRemainTicks
-		ARG 5 titleFadeOutTicks
+		ARG 3 titleFadeIn
+		ARG 4 titleRemain
+		ARG 5 titleFadeOut

timeline.bodyText: How does this differentiate from other logging methods?
timeline.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Logs a message to the dedicated server hosting the rcon connection
replies.author: i509VCB

timeline.bodyText: You use argumentName elsewhere, so this should be argumentClass to be consistent.
timeline.author: Runemoro
